name: davidpersson/mm
description: The PHP media library: media processing and MIME-Type/extension guessing.

suggest.ext-fileinfo: Enables the recommended fileinfo MIME-type magic adapter.
suggest.ext-imagick >= 3.0.0: Enables the high quality media process/info Imagick adapter.
suggest.ext-gd: Enabled media process/info GD adapter, good when imagick is not an option.
suggest.FFmpeg 1.*: Enables transcoding and processing of videos.
suggest.SoX: Enables transcoding and processing of audio data.
